author: Charles Campbell
title: How To Watch Trump’s Joint Address To Congress Live
text:
— PBS NewsHour (@NewsHour) February 26, 2017 
The White House says the theme of the speech is “Renewal of the American Spirit — an Optimistic Vision for All Americans.” It was penned with help from Trump’s close aide, Stephen Miller. 
Health care, immigration, infrastructure spending and tax reform are just some of the issues expected to be touched upon. The content of the speech was designed to rally Americans toward a hopeful future. Advertisement - story continues below 
The president attempted to set the tone in an early-morning interview on Fox and Friends, giving himself high marks for achievement and effort. 
Trump has also invited families of victims of violent crimes committed by illegal immigrant crimes to attend the speech. 
The family members will sit with first lady Melania Trump during the speech. 
The president has also invited Maureen Scalia, widow of former Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia, to be his guest at the speech. Advertisement - story continues below
